# Pull Request

## Description

Briefly describe the change and why it’s needed.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] CI / tooling

## How to test

Describe how to validate the change (commands, HTTP requests, etc.).

## Checklist

- [ ] I added/updated tests (or explained why they’re not needed)
- [ ] `pytest` passes locally
- [ ] Behavior follows ADO conventions (envelopes, HTTP status codes)
- [ ] No secrets were added (fixtures/logs)
- [ ] CHANGELOG is updated for notable changes (`CHANGELOG.md` → `Unreleased`)
- [ ] Title/commits follow Conventional Commits

## Notes

Add any additional context here (ADO docs links, Terraform HTTP traces, etc.).
